#-----Solution-----

#Get input
num = int(input())
cheeses = []
for i in range(num):
	cheeses.append(input().split())

#Count soft and hard cheeses
soft = []
hard = []
for cheese in cheeses:
	if cheese[1] == "soft":
		soft.append(cheese[0])
	elif cheese[1] == "hard":
		hard.append(cheese[0])

#Output
print(len(hard))

# SOLUTION

n = int(input())
soft = []
hard = []
for _ in range(n):
    cheese, ch = input().split()
    if ch == "soft":
        soft.append(cheese)
    else:
        hard.append(cheese)
print(len(soft))
